kv6.10:1.3: Rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ cakkhusmiṃ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?
kv6.10:3.9: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
kv6.10:3.10: attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv6.10:4.4: Nanu passati abhikkamantaṃ paṭikkamantaṃ ālokentaṃ vilokentaṃ samiñjentaṃ pasārentanti?
kv6.10:4.6: Hañci passati abhikkamantaṃ paṭikkamantaṃ ālokentaṃ vilokentaṃ samiñjentaṃ pasārentaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv6.10:5.1: Niyamo asaṅkhato, paṭiccasamuppādo asaṅkhato, cattāri saccāni asaṅkhatāni, cattāro āruppā asaṅkhatā, nirodhasamāpatti asaṅkhatā, ākāso asaṅkhato, ākāso sanidassano, cattāro mahābhūtā, pañcindriyāni, tatheva kāyakammanti.
